weather.title: Weather Conditions
weather.whyPerfect: Why Lake Garda is Perfect for Sailing
weather.windsDescription: Lake Garda enjoys reliable thermal winds that develop daily, creating perfect sailing conditions. The morning "Peler" wind from the north and afternoon "Ora" wind from the south provide consistent sailing throughout the day.
weather.watersDescription: Surrounded by mountains, Lake Garda offers protected waters that are ideal for learning and racing. The lake's size provides enough space for proper racing while maintaining safe conditions for all skill levels.

equipment.title: Equipment Provided
equipment.firstAid: First aid kit and emergency equipment
equipment.yachtsDescription: We use modern Bavaria 34 cruiser-racers and similar high-performance yachts. These boats are specifically chosen for their racing capabilities while maintaining comfort and safety for our participants.
equipment.safetyDescription: All safety equipment meets international standards. Our boats are regularly inspected and maintained to the highest standards. Every participant receives a comprehensive safety briefing before departure.

experience.question: Do I need sailing experience?
experience.answer: No sailing experience is required! Our professional skippers will teach you everything you need to know. We welcome complete beginners and experienced sailors alike.

bring.question: What should I bring?
bring.answer: Bring comfortable clothes, sunscreen, a hat, and a change of clothes. We provide all sailing equipment, safety gear, and waterproof bags for your belongings.

weather.question: What if the weather is bad?
weather.answer: Safety is our priority. If conditions are unsafe, we'll reschedule your experience at no extra cost. Light rain doesn't stop us - it's part of the adventure!

people.question: How many people per boat?
people.answer: Each yacht accommodates 6-8 participants plus the professional skipper. This ensures personalized attention and an intimate experience.

meals.question: Are meals included?
meals.answer: Lunch is not included in the base price, but we can arrange catering at the marina restaurant. Many participants enjoy the local Italian cuisine as part of their experience.

camera.question: Can I bring my camera?
camera.answer: Absolutely! We also provide professional photography services. You'll receive high-quality photos and videos of your racing experience within 24 hours.

bookingAdvance.question: How far in advance should I book?
bookingAdvance.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 days in advance, especially during peak season (June-September). Same-day bookings may be available depending on weather and capacity.

cancellation.question: What if I need to cancel?
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before your experience. See our cancellation policy for full details.

groupDiscounts.question: Do you offer group discounts?
groupDiscounts.answer: Yes! We offer special rates for groups of 6 or more people. Contact us directly for custom pricing and corporate event packages.

languages.question: What languages do you speak?
languages.answer: Our team speaks English, German, Italian, and Russian. All safety briefings and instructions are provided in your preferred language.
